title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: A Cognitive Style-Based Science Learning Effectiveness Project

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their cognitive styles (verbal/visual) and explain their learning preferences.
Learners can reconstruct scientific concepts with over 80% accuracy using multiple representation formats (text + images + diagrams).
Learners can develop drafts of cognitive style-tailored instructional designs through peer feedback and instructor evaluation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
